sub_title: Front Office Manager PURE Resorts Ehrwald
summary: My own personal work style in the work place is showing positive attitude and teamwork. I have also acquired business communication skills in order to portray professionalism and respect in the work environment. Furthermore, due to my time living both in the Middle East and Europe I am able to understand cultural awareness and how working in different cultures allows me to be professional and cooperate efficiently with my colleagues.
